text: William de Dratton was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1232 to 1234: he was also Chancellor he was a native of East Drayton.University of Leicester == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:People from Nottinghamshire Category:13th-century English people
title: William de Dratton
